mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wilkinson, Nathan to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilkinson, Nathan
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Apl 20 1863. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 20 1863. I sent a squad Saturday night to Johnstown & captured Maj Armesy & Lt Davis of rebeldom they are now en route for Balto arrested J Vance last evening on the strength of a sentence in a letter from Gordon to Armesy which reads thus- J Vance is gathering a large company to go out with us he says by your (Armesy's) authority N. Wilkinson Col Comdg 6th brigade 62W191coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wilkinson, Nathan
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
